messages.body:
Agent Lonslo Tossov of the Foreign Office has returned refreshed and recharged after a spiritual retreat at the Holy Bagel Community.
The exploits of the Foreign Office are too numerous to list here in their entirety, but fans will no doubt remember THE SCAMMISH ARMADA ,  LADY AGATHA IS A RUSTY, PINK PIG, and I'LL SHOW YOU MINE IF YOU SHOW ME YOURS.

 - "Head of Foreign Operations, Banque commercial du Bukina Faso"
vs.
 - going undercover as an international financier

messages.subject: let talk on messenger very urgent
messages.body:
Dear Friend,
My name is Mr Nasser Hosaih.i work as an external auditor for the Banque commercial du Bukina Faso, Ouagadougou.(BCB) Bukina-Faso, working as part of a bigger team that covers the entire African region,i had taken pains to find your contact through personal endeavors,On routine audit check last month, I discovered some investment Accounts that had been dormant for the last seven years.


All the accounts belong to a single holder (NAME WITH HELD) with monies totaling a little above $20.25 million United States Dollars plus interest,We need a trust-worthy partner to assist us in
receiving this funds for further investment in your country,You will be required to:
(1) Assist us in the receiving of this sum in your Country.
(2) Advise on areas for potential future investment in your country.
(3) Assist us in carrying a feasibility study before actual investment.
If you decide to render your service to us in this regard,you will be entitled to a percentage that
will be discussed later with you.
I do expect your prompt response on my private email (nasser_hosaih1@hotmail.com ) if you are willing to work with us.
Thank you and regards.
Mr Nasser Hosaih
Head of Foreign Operations
Banque commercial du Bukina Faso
messages.raw:

All the accounts belong to a single holder (NAME WITH HELD) with monies totaling a little above $20.25 million United States Dollars plus interest,We need a trust-worthy partner to assist us in receiving this funds for further investment in your country,You will be required to:
(1) Assist us in the receiving of this sum in your Country.
(2) Advise on areas for potential future investment in your country.
(3) Assist us in carrying a feasibility study before actual investment.
If you decide to render your service to us in this regard,you will be entitled to a percentage that will be discussed later with you.
I do expect your prompt response on my private email (nasser_hosaih1@hotmail.com ) if you are willing to work with us.
Thank you and regards.
Mr Nasser Hosaih
Head of Foreign Operations
Banque commercial du Bukina Faso

messages.subject: NEXT STEP INFORMATION, FILL THE ATTACHED APPLICATION FORM AND CALL ME.
messages.body:
Dear TOSSOV,
Frankly speaking, I thank your reply mail and the way you express issues. However, I once again guarantee you that all arrangement for the smooth documentation clearance and claim has already been concluded here locally in Burkina Faso. I had taken pains to find your contact through personal endeavors after much prayers before the Almighty Allah . be informed also that the bank is capable to send money to any part of the world as long as you properly furnish them with your bank name ,bank account, bank swift code as you can see in the Attached application form.


However, i require you to cooperate with me in the claim of this fund, your cooperation shall include, providing us with a receiving foreign account details as to enable the receipt of the fund .


Your assistance shall be equally needed on the documentation clearance procedures because your name and signature shall be used as the original beneficiary to the deceased. In view of the above, as regarding the percentage, it shall be share in the ration of 60/40 percent. Meaning 40% for you and 60% for me. All expenses that may occur during the process of this transaction shall be a collective effort.


as the procedure demands , you have to first send an application of claim to the bank , the bank on the receipt of such application shall forward you with an official questionnaire which contain all questions relating to the deceased.


 the bank shall expect you  to answer such questions very correctly as the original next of kin to the decease , upon the answer of the questions very correctly , the bank shall forward you with a letter of acceptance to your claim as the original inheritance to decease and payment shall be completed into your nominated bank account through telegraphic transfer ( t/t wire ) within 72hrs.


based on the above , we forward you with a sketch of the application of claim , fill your details , sign the below and forward a copy to me first as to check for correction before you send the same directly to the bank electronic email address  bcb_commercialbf@bk.ru  regarding the answers to the bank official questionnaire , I guarantee you that i shall forward you with all correct answer which shall be copied out from the same deceased personal file which is still in the bank strong room. You can equally call me on this direct number +22676585280.


I advise you to ask question for proper clarification .
Truly yours
Nasser Hosaih

messages.subject: please condition this mail point after point.
messages.body:
Dearest Tossov,
honestly speaking, i don`t mean to hurt your feeling in any way, nither am i trying to betray my world. but the truth is, i find you as one that talk too much and at such you are not fit for this transaction because it take a man to do it and not a talkative. sorry once more if i sound rud. but i had to be open with you.


am i man of one word and each time i utter a word, i stand by it. please sir, this transaction is my life and i would not like to start and at the middle get into trouble and at the end lose the fund. this is my greatest fear. i trust you as a man but the way you sound make it immposible for me to have any international transaction with you.


once again, i will be ready to consider working with you if you assure me the following by OATH.


1, that you will not in any way inform my bank about my involvement in this transaction.


2,that you will not disappoint me at the end.


3,that any expenses that may occure during the process will be a collective effort.


if you can assure me of the above listed conditions by Oath then i will be free to work with you.


once again, sorry if i sound rud, honestly speaking, this is not my nature.


thanks
Mr Nasser.

i wise you safe trip back home

thanks

Nasser
